See also: kuche

German[edit]

Etymology[edit]

From Old High German chuhhina, from late Proto-Germanic *kukinǭ, from Vulgar Latin *cocīna, from Latin coquīna. See there for cognates and details.

Pronunciation[edit]

  • IPA(key): /ˈkʏçə/ (standard)
    • audio (Austria)
      		(file)
  • IPA(key): /ˈkyːçə/ (sometimes in Low German areas)
    • Audio
      		(file)

Noun[edit]

Küche f (genitive Küche, plural Küchen)

  1. kitchen (room)
  2. cuisine (cooking traditions)

Declension[edit]

indef.def.noundef.noun

genitiveeinerderKüchederKüchen

Derived terms[edit]

  • küchen-
  • Küchenmaschine
